arts.ttl: Nathan Jones praises Charlton Athletic mentality as they strike late again to climb to 5th in League One
arts.sum: It’s always tricky for ten men, but then when they go a goal down as well, they’ve got nothing to lose. Nathan Jones praised the mentality of his Charlton Athletic side as they struck yet another late goal to beat Peterborough United and climb to 5 th in the League One table.

arts.ttl: Macaulay Gillesphey scores late winner for Charlton against 10-man Peterborough
arts.sum: Emmanuel Fernandez was sent off for the visitors.

arts.ttl: ‘From bad to worse’ – Charlton Athletic vs Peterborough United prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Charlton Athletic vs Peterborough United prediction ahead of the League One clash on Tuesday. The post ‘From bad to worse’ – Charlton Athletic vs Peterborough United prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
